testcase.classname: As a user, I want to validate news article from guardian news website
testcase.name: Launch guardian news websiite
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the guardian news website...............................passed When I click on the news link from the menu.................................passed And I select the headlines news.............................................passed Then I should be able to see the news page of that headline.................passed And I should be able to copy and save to file the headline of the news......passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I want to validate news article from guardian news website
testcase.name: To validate the headline news retrieved from guardian news with other resources on google
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to google website..........................................passed When I search for the headline news from the guardian site..................passed Then I should see a list of other sources with similar news details.........passed And I am able to confirm that the news article Fake or not..................passed
